Introduction

B-Joo is a South Korean singer under Hunus Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group XENO-T.

His stage name comes from his real name ByungJoo, but also holds the meaning of ‘Be With You’ so that he’ll always be with his fans.

In 2017, he participated on the idol rebooting project show The Unit. He was eliminated in episode 14 and finished in 25th place.

B-Joo enlisted on April 9th, 2019.
